twitter-card.title: Hi! I'm Andrés Arredondo
twitter-card.description: Bachelor's degree in Agrogenomic Sciences with experience in programming languages, specifically R and Bash.

markdown.markdown:
::: {#hero-heading} I am a Bachelor in Agrogenomic Sciences with experience in bioinformatics and programming in R, Python, and Bash. My work involves using molecular biology and microbiology techniques to identify microorganisms under the ISO 9001:2015 standard. [Learn more about me →](/about.html){.about-links .subtitle} ::: ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12} ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}

About me, my interests and experience, and my work as a Bachelor of science.

ABOUT
::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}

I sometimes write about what I'm doing and learning, mostly about bioinformatics.

POSTS
::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}

I´m involved some projects. Here are links to their repos, websites and any other resources.

PROJECTS
::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}

Where to find me online and how to get in touch. I'd love to hear from you!

CONTACT
::: ::: ```{r} #| echo: false # https://blog.djnavarro.net/posts/2022-04-20_porting-to-quarto/#netlify-redirects # list names of posts, talks and packages folders posts <- list.dirs( path = here::here("posts"), full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE ) talks <- list.dirs( path = here::here("talks"), full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE ) packages <- list.dirs( path = here::here("packages"), full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE ) # extract the slugs posts_slugs <- gsub("^.*_", "", posts) talks_slugs <- gsub("^.*_", "", talks) packages_slugs <- gsub("^.*_", "", packages) # redirects from distill site distill_redirects <- c("/posts/2017-06-17-n-letter-words/ /posts/2017-06-17_n-letter-words/", "/posts/2020-12-09-advent-of-code-2020/ /2020-12-09_advent-of-code-2020/", "/2021-05-08-welcome-to-my-distill-website/ /posts/2021-05-08_welcome-distill/", "/posts/2021-05-25-custom-syntax-highlighting-for-distill-part-1-modifying-the-default-theme/ /posts/2021-05-25_custom-highlighting-distill-1/", "/2021-05-26-custom-syntax-highlighting-for-distill-part-2-creating-the-palette/ /posts/2021-05-26_custom-highlighting-distill-2/", "/talks/2017-05-25-an-overview-of-htmlwidgets/ /talks/2017-05-25_overview-of-htmlwidgets/", "/talks/2017-07-06-introducing-bradleyterryscalable/ /talks/2017-07-06_introducing-bradleyterryscalable/", "/talks/2018-08-23-phd-as-package/ /talks/2018-08-23_phd-as-package/", "/talks/2019-10-05-working-with-text-in-r/ /talks/2019-10-05_working-with-text-in-r/", "/talks/2020-10-29-how-to-get-help-in-r/ /talks/2020-10-29_how-to-get-help-in-r/", "/projects.html /packages.html") # lines to insert to a netlify _redirect file posts_redirects <- paste0("/", posts_slugs, " ", "/posts/", posts) talks_redirects <- paste0("/", talks_slugs, " ", "/talks/", talks) packages_redirects <- paste0("/", packages_slugs, " ", "/packages/", packages) redirects <- c(distill_redirects, posts_redirects, talks_redirects, packages_redirects) # write the _redirect file writeLines(redirects, here::here("_redirects")) ```

My work involves using molecular biology and microbiology techniques to identify microorganisms under the ISO 9001:2015 standard. ::: ::: ```{r} #| echo: false # redirects strategy from djnavarro # https://blog.djnavarro.net/posts/2022-04-20_porting-to-quarto/#netlify-redirects # list names of posts, talks and packages folders posts <- list.dirs( path = here::here("posts"), full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE ) talks <- list.dirs( path = here::here("talks"), full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE ) packages <- list.dirs( path = here::here("packages"), full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE ) # extract the slugs posts_slugs <- gsub("^.*_", "", posts) talks_slugs <- gsub("^.*_", "", talks) packages_slugs <- gsub("^.*_", "", packages) # redirects from distill site distill_redirects <- c("/posts/2017-06-17-n-letter-words/ /posts/2017-06-17_n-letter-words/", "/posts/2020-12-09-advent-of-code-2020/ /2020-12-09_advent-of-code-2020/", "/2021-05-08-welcome-to-my-distill-website/ /posts/2021-05-08_welcome-distill/", "/posts/2021-05-25-custom-syntax-highlighting-for-distill-part-1-modifying-the-default-theme/ /posts/2021-05-25_custom-highlighting-distill-1/", "/2021-05-26-custom-syntax-highlighting-for-distill-part-2-creating-the-palette/ /posts/2021-05-26_custom-highlighting-distill-2/", "/talks/2017-05-25-an-overview-of-htmlwidgets/ /talks/2017-05-25_overview-of-htmlwidgets/", "/talks/2017-07-06-introducing-bradleyterryscalable/ /talks/2017-07-06_introducing-bradleyterryscalable/", "/talks/2018-08-23-phd-as-package/ /talks/2018-08-23_phd-as-package/", "/talks/2019-10-05-working-with-text-in-r/ /talks/2019-10-05_working-with-text-in-r/", "/talks/2020-10-29-how-to-get-help-in-r/ /talks/2020-10-29_how-to-get-help-in-r/", "/projects.html /packages.html") # lines to insert to a netlify _redirect file posts_redirects <- paste0("/", posts_slugs, " ", "/posts/", posts) talks_redirects <- paste0("/", talks_slugs, " ", "/talks/", talks) packages_redirects <- paste0("/", packages_slugs, " ", "/packages/", packages) redirects <- c(distill_redirects, posts_redirects, talks_redirects, packages_redirects) # write the _redirect file writeLines(redirects, here::here("_redirects")) ```
